entries.name: file_name
entries.desc: The current file name being displayed

entries.name: new(out_stream, *args)
entries.desc: Creates a new threaded download reporter that will display on out_stream.  The other arguments are ignored.

entries.name: fetch(file_name, *args)
entries.desc: Tells the download reporter that the file_name is being fetched. The other arguments are ignored.

entries.name: update(bytes)
entries.desc: Updates the threaded download reporter for the given number of bytes.
